channel.title: Dodian gay npc glitch!

item.title: Dodian gay npc glitch!
item.dc:creator: @fallen_darkness fallen darkness
item.description:
@fallen_darkness wrote:

I added this to my public boolean process

if ((playerEquipment[playerHat] == 1037) && npcId != 1320) { npcId = 1320; isNpc = true; sendMessage("You put on the Bunny Ears..."); sendMessage("...and turn into a bunny!"); } else if ((playerEquipment[playerHat] != 1037) && npcId == 1320) { npcId= 0; isNpc = false; sendMessage("You take off the Bunny Ears..."); sendMessage("...and turn back into a human."); }

and wenever i wear the item itâ€™s suppose to transform me into a bunny.

BUT IT TRANSFORMS ME INTO A MAN NPC SUM1 HELP!!!

Read full topic
